author: guijunhua
body:
HI， I use powershell 7.1.3 to Invoke-command to windows server 2016, the server use windows powershell 
cmmand is :

Invoke-Command  -Session $Session -ScriptBlock {      Get-Item -Path "C:\Zabbix"  }

the return is wrong . 
it is worked on windows powershell to to windows powershell 
![BUG](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32589055/120130462-da182e00-c1f8-11eb-966b-dbd45cd08c18.png)




## Environment data
7.1.3

```none

```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: It seems we already have such issue registered in the repo for years.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Invoke-command  to windows session to get-item return not right
